title: Best chocolate chip cheesecake
ingredients: ['125g digestive biscuit crumbs', '5 tablespoons caster sugar', '75g butter, melted', '5 tablespoons unsweetened cocoa powder', '675g cream cheese', '1 (397g) tin condensed sweetened milk', '3 eggs', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '170g mini plain chocolate chips', '1 teaspoon plain flour']
